persona.name: Alyssa Black
persona.personality: Resilient and determined, deeply affected by personal loss yet committed to raising awareness about suicide prevention and advocating for legislative change.
persona.notes: Mother of Andrew Black, actively campaigning for a 24-hour waiting period for gun purchases in Vermont following her son's suicide.
persona.communication_style: Articulate and passionate, speaks with conviction and emotional depth about gun safety and mental health issues.
